meta.title: ComplexRuleConditionPost - Models - API Reference
meta.description: The model for a POST to create conditions on a complex rule.

blocks.data: The model for a POST to create conditions on a complex rule.

id.description: The unique numeric ID of the rule condition; increments sequentially.

rule_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the rule with which the condition is associated.

modifier_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the modifier with which the rule condition is associated.

modifier_value_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the modifier value with which the rule condition is associated.

variant_id.description: The unique numeric ID of the variant with which the rule condition is associated.
